adrFormatAddress: 521 Park Ave, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text: I'm thrilled to share my positive experience with the facelift I received. The results exceeded all my expectations, giving me a refreshed and natural appearance. Dr. Levine is highly skilled, and the staff provided excellent care throughout the process. I feel more confident and beyond grateful. Dr Levine tailors all work to the individual.  My neck and face are amazing. The investment was worth every penny. I traveled to NY to achieve a natural looking result, and it was worth it. I live in Florida, I can say that the facelifts I have seen in Florida do not compare in any way to Dr. Levine, nor do they last.  Look no further!!!

originalText.text: I want to let women know how talented Dr Levine is. I had a mastectomy almost 10 years ago. I was never 100% happy with the end results.  I never rushed into surgery as after having so many surgeries back then it just was not something I wanted to do so quickly, even though I was unhappy. I finally  met Dr Levine after interviewing a few other doctors. Once upon meeting with him, I went directly to his office manager Cortney. I booked my surgery .He made me feel validated, he made me feel confident.  Now a month after surgery I just cannot believe i waited so long. I feel so much more comfortable. I love the outcome. I finally have breasts that look nice. My size is once again perfect.  Dr Levine and his staff are excellent. This was truly the easiest surgery I have ever had.

originalText.text:
What a life changing experience.  Dr. Levine is a outstanding plastic surgeon and the results speak to his level of expertise and perfection. I had a face and neck lift...upper and lower eyelid
with fat removal... a upper lip lift and a face peel. The results are amazing. Dr Levine...his Surgical Coordinator Cortney and the entire staff are the most professional and caring people you will ever encounter in this industry. One of the best decisions I have ever made was to choose Dr. Levine for one of the most important decisions of my life.

originalText.text: Dr. Levine is hands down the best when it comes to looking into getting a procedure done. He was both knowledgeable and kind throughout the whole process - from our first meeting to the completed surgery. I was entirely confident to undergo my procedure and the result absolutely speaks for itself. The compliments are constant, and every one that has seen the results are impressed. He was attentive, understanding, and helpful throughout the whole process and I absolutely will be seeing him again. Thank you so much, Dr. Levine, for helping me become more confident. Truly wonderful.

originalText.text:
This review is for anyone having second thoughts about booking any cosmetic procedure with Dr. Steven Levine. As someone who works in the healthcare field, I encounter clinicians every day. Dr.Levine is undoubtedly the best in class, from his professionalism, expertise, bed-side manner, and meticulous commitment to excellence.

I had a rhinoplasty and reconstruction of a scar on my nose. I was a bit wary about the outcome, but I can unequivocally say going to Dr. Levine was one of the best decisions I’ve made.

Dr. Levine has gifted hands and is genuinely a kind and compassionate individual. Dr. Levine and his team deserve all the accolades they’ve received and more. I can not thank him and his team enough.
